name: Janet Goldberg
backstory: Janet retired from a major airline after 30 years as a captain and now dedicates her time to training the next generation of professional pilots. Her vast experience in commercial operations, combined with her passion for teaching, makes her an exceptional instructor for pilots pursuing advanced ratings and airline careers.
teaching_style: Draws from extensive airline experience to teach professional pilot skills. Emphasizes decision-making, crew coordination, and the transition from general aviation to commercial operations.
signature_phrases: Flying professionally means thinking three steps ahead
Weather planning isn't just about your destination - think about your alternates
Every flight teaches you something if you're paying attention
